alert.note: Alert for Flathead National Forest, Glacier Park, Bob Marshall And Mission Mountain Wilderness; Kootenai National Forest, Talley Lake District, fnf (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued September 03 at 6:49AM MDT until September 04 at 12:00AM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO MIDNIGHT MDT TONIGHT... * Affected area: Fire Zone 104 (Kootenai). Fire Zone 105 (Flathead/Glacier Park). * Impacts: The combination of gusty winds, low humidity, and an unstable atmosphere will result in critical fire weather conditions this afternoon and evening. Isolated thunderstorms are possible this afternoon and evening, which could contribute to new fire starts. Thunderstorms will be capable of gusty and erratic outflows. * Winds: Southwest to west 15 to 20 mph with gusts to 35 mph. * Minimum humidities: 12 to 20 percent. * Haines: 5 Moderate. &&

area.areaDesc: Flathead National Forest, Glacier Park, Bob Marshall And Mission Mountain Wilderness; Kootenai National Forest, Talley Lake District, fnf
